episode_summary: In this episode, Linda Ugelow shares strategies for overcoming public speaking anxiety and building confidence in communication. She emphasizes the importance of authenticity in video content and provides actionable tips for REALTORS to leverage platforms like TikTok. The discussion also covers mindfulness and self-forgiveness as tools for personal development and effective communication.
